comments.text:
"*It hurted more when Akane stabbed me.*" - 10 Really Cute Things to Say to Your Yandere

For such a silly show, I like how it actually has an explanation for everything that happens. I mean, Akane is a Yandere but not because she loves Seiji. She's been raised to believe that her knives are the solution to everything. If you get cheated or if your boyfriend is pissing you off: Murder him. She's not crazy for love, her mother created that psychotic nature. Seiji just happens to bring that side of her with every little mistake he does.

Outside of that, Akane is a pretty kind girlfriend but not insanely attached. She will act cold to you because she wants attention and won't push her curiosity any further to give your privacy. She's not your typical yandere. She actually feels more... Human, so to speak. Which makes it weirder coming from this show.
She's a yandere done right.
That's why she is best gril
She's a yandere i want to do right
That's a good way to put it and I could see over a long period of time her losing more and more yandere traits as her relationship with seiji and the girls progresses.

* [It's kinda heartbreaking to see Akane cry.](http://i.imgur.com/EcXQQ5Z.png) Those eyes tho...

* [Yuzu's mom is 10/10, she's pretty awesome.](http://i.imgur.com/6jthSjW.png)

* [Unlimited Katana Works!](http://i.imgur.com/Y1tGUqz.png)

* I find it amusing that Guri the Angel who is also the only daughter of Kami-sama is the least extraordinary thing in this show, [even she knows it too!](http://i.imgur.com/Ga4D3Tp.png)

* [Like mothers, liker daugters.](http://i.imgur.com/oHvBUtD.png) Hopefully Seiji's polygamous relationship ends happier than theirs.

* [Tsundere/Yandere Mom.](http://i.imgur.com/EgTb57V.png) Alright, Akane's mom is starting to grow on me. She's alright.

* [Well it looks like we know who's Shikimi's next target will be...](http://i.imgur.com/lRuSovt.png)

In case you were curious where this genius meme came from, its from middle aged mom's making shitty minion memes on facebook that don't use acronyms or meme formats correctly.

Yuzu's mum is gorgeous. New best girl.

[](#rerorero)
with misaka mikoto's voice, hnng?
She still loves that dude though, but at least we'll see more of her.

Man. This is the show where all girls deserve to be best girl.

Yuzu's mom was a total treasure. Until she finds out Yuzu is in love with Akane-tan and she's technically dating Seiji. Wished Yuzu stayed in her [shinobi gear](http://imgur.com/EjOuLbn.jpg), she was so adorable.

It's funny how all the drama completely shut off Aqua from this episode even though she was just a few feet away from Seiji before Shikimi jumped in to scene.

Guri makes the best [visual gags](http://imgur.com/CzaOdSN.jpg) in the show (not to mention the [yaoi love](http://imgur.com/IOkkLBI.jpg) bomb). That ["we match"](http://imgur.com/l1lpQlz) joke left me laughing for a while.

Mama-sama's still a total treasure even then. Didn't even think she's mad at Yuzu or Seiji, just servant guy for keeping her out of the loop.

Poor servant guy can't catch a break though. Guri should find a nice guy to pair up with him. ~~Maybe that one remaining goon who wasn't caught in her yaoi love bomb~~
Poor guy. Shafted because there was an uneven number of yakuza.
Aqua was busy dealing with her feelings after the worlds most gorgeous cat was thrown at her.
New commentface material from [Yuzu](https://gfycat.com/ExhaustedRashFly) and [her mother?](https://gfycat.com/ConcernedSimplisticErne)
Without context that Yuzu face is scary... Don't do time travel, kids.
This show has the best comment faces I've ever seen
subtitles removed i would agree
i loved mama samas reactions

> No matter how scary you try to look by erasing your eye highlights

I love those fourth wall breaks
[yup](http://i.imgur.com/QptLlgv.png)

This was Renai Boukun at his best. Good story development with a nice background explanation about the clans and their rivalry, cute moments and a lot of funny faces. I read the manga till this point, so I'm really curious to see what's next.

Btw Akane established her run to best girl and waifu material

This has probably been my favorite episode yet. Maybe the one that had Seiji go to heaven could rival it. But I completely agree, this one had everything. Guri making 4th wall break jokes(I'm starting to feel like the normal one here), Mama-sama aka best name ever, epic fight scenes, top tier romance. This show has everything. Including a sadist though...
I love the way they carry over visual gags from the manga, like the speech bubble impaling Seiji's head, which turned into one of the best jokes of the episode.
Man, this show just does whatever it wants and gets away with it. But after that strong showing from Akane, how does Guri even compete anymore. Wrap it up, we're done here.
Guri is best girl
Guri is the only reason I'm still watching this.

> Guri's chances

Indeed. I already feel like this is a story about how Guri learns what love is, by learning the need to step out of a loving relationship between Akane and Seiji.

TFW when Shikmi will never tie you up and sit on you

[](#barakamonnotcool)
You forgot the stabbing part.
The best part.

That was both a very intense and cute episode! It was really sad to see Akane-san force herself not to love Seiji-kun, and it was such a cute moment when she said how much she loves him. Truly one of the best romance Anime I've seen, and easily my AOTS!

[](#rengehype)

Also, the fight between Akane's mom and Yuzu's mom was really intense and [Guri managed to give us the meta-est of meta comments!](http://i.imgur.com/L3YpsGr.jpg)
The entire time the fight was onscreen I was going "wtf is going on? This isn't naruto!"

You know it's a weird episode when Guri isn't the centerpoint of it.

Instead we have two sisters who represent their clans of the sword and shield duking it out who also happened to fall for the same guy in the past.

I will say Guri just randomly kissing Seiji to provoke Akane was the moment of the episode; gotta appreciate more carefree stuff like that in romcoms. Only other show that I can think off the top of my head where they do this is Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches.

Today's conclusion : Seiji is at least one waifu ahead in his harem, compared to his x2 father in law. (and... he has some unofficial harem members as well, like Shikimi, and even Aqua). Even more, Seiji's harem has more connections.  

Inb4 somehow this turns out that that guy is somehow Seiji's father. Then we [](/s "School Days...")
I can tell you that that guy is not Seiji's father. This is not a spoiler because we already seen Seiji's dad and mom together early on.

I know they showed Seiji's parents, but the other dad looks were left ambiguous, so that my theory could be plausible.
 Or could have been , were it not for a certain manga reader who confirmed that is not the case.
No biggie, show is still crazy enough without it..
I going to go a bit crazy here but what if it's actually god who is their father? Thus making Guri, Yuzu amd Akane half sisters.
It's not Kami either.
Are you reading the manga? If so do you know Japanese? Because last I hear the translator stop translating it or something.
I read the manga up to Ch 45. All were translated to English. And the ID of the dad was revealed in the manga, but anything more will be spoilers.
close but cigar
I think you mean "close, but no cigar", right?
close, but cigar
close the cigar butt.

dude, i hate the premise of yanderes. who wants some pyschotic person after you 24/7? but anyway, akane has been best girl since ep 1. as soon as i figured out he was immortal and so were all of the other possible love interests that akane might murder... yeah, she's the best. and now we see that she isn't just a yandere for no reason. she's a yandere because of her moms horrible parenting. and she just defied that parenting. so she might become a deredere or something in the future because she's already breaking away from her moms teaching.

[deleted]

That actually raises an interesting question- why use the low-rent version of Prokofiev's "Montagues and Capulets" for the show rather than the real one?

It would have lost its copyright in 1990 and not regained it in 2014 when Japan extended its copyright protection, being more than 70 years old.

I'm not sure how it works in Japan, but in the US you'd also need to find a recording that was old enough. Just because the sheet music and original composition are in the public domain doesn't mean an arbitrary performance of it is.
I think in G-string they composed those music themselves?
Pretty sure it's royalty free music, hence why MGQ used it

I'd guess that these are arcs in the manga, spanning multiple chapters, but are condensed down to one episode in the anime, so they're not really arcs anymore.
